attributes.action: Hold a referendum before leaving the EU on No Deal basis
attributes.additional_details: In the absence of any other options, the two choices open to the UK are a "No Deal Brexit" or remaining within the EU. A "No Deal Brexit" was not one of the choices offered in the original referendum, so it would be undemocratic for the UK government to proceed with a No Deal Brexit without putting this hugely important matter to the British people.
attributes.background: The EU Withdrawal Agreement does not seem to have parliamentary support. If parliament rejects the deal, and all further possibility of negotiation has been exhausted, the government should hold a referendum giving us the choice between a no-deal Brexit and remaining in the EU.
